AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: Requests should be in letter form explaining the nature of the request, the purpose of the grant and any other pertinent information that should be considered. Sufficient detail should be presented to adequately position the grant request in a manner that can be easily implicit from the request.
